parameters.name: All
parameters.description: Specifies whether to detach all tags from the resource. This parameter only takes effect when the TagKey.N parameter is not configured. Default value: **false**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the resource is deployed.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The IDs of the resources from which you want to detach tags.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resources. Valid values:

*   **INSTANCE**
*   **TOPIC**
*   **CONSUMERGROUP**

>  The value of this parameter is not case-sensitive.
